reviews.text: Very nice location, heritage ambience, and excellent hospitality by all the staff, specially on the reception Mr.Sufiyaan. Rooms very spacious and comfortable. We stayed at ground floor facing the valley it was awesome. Will definitely revisit the resort whenever next time at mahableshwar.
reviews.title: Excellent location and heritage ambience.

reviews.text: I will rate this hotel 2 * , I don't know how it was given 4* rating .Rooms were okay Bath room did not had bath tub no liquid hand wash .If you call for tea set or any house keeping service they take 20 - 30 minutes
reviews.title: Pathetic Service .

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms were nice, comfortable and spacious. The location is beautifull and breathtaking (in August, monsoons particularly) There was a lot of Fog but the col breeze was just awesome. The staff is polite and helpfull too. Food is not up to the mark or i would say too pricey for the kind of taste it had. But then, the buffet breakfast was good and met our expectations. We will definitely visit again.
reviews.title: I can assure this one to be the best in its class..

reviews.text: We enjoyed a lot in MPG CLUB at mahabaleshwar is undoubtedly by far the best place to stay in mahabaleshwar.It is situated just few min away from the market n hence location ally very good, besides the property is also made very well n the staff was friendly also very courteous special thanks To sufiyaan For helping us for All The time.The food was also very great n a lot of variety is there although we are vegetarians but my fiends enjoyed all the variety.They also have a lot of indoor activities n hence great with kids. We had a great time at MPG CLUB n will definitely be here again.
reviews.title: Enjoyeble stay at MPG

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After reading the reviews from trip advisor I had shortlisted this hotel..and I must say it was a very right decison..The resort is just too good...It is very well located near a valley with green bushes around it..Although due to monsoon we cudnt njoy the valley view but the fog around was just awsome..it makes you feel like touching the skies..I had opted for Haute view room which has a balcony with it..However if you want your trip to be more economical I would suggest you to go for mansion picket room(if you can compromise on the view)..Also a special mention for the staff there espicialy sufiyan who was very helpful and co operative during our trip.he helped us arrange site seeing and also suggested places to visit during monsoon..Overall a great experience..places must visit - kates point,lingmala waterfall, table land (panchgani)
reviews.title: Out of the world...

reviews.text: I enjoyed my stay in MPG club. Room was comfortable with a good valley view and a huge garden. Room Service, Cleanliness, upkeep of the property and above all the food was great. I stayed here with my family. Service was very good and staff very helpful particularly Sufiyan. Hotel is value for money. I will visit once again when I go to Mahabaleshwar.
reviews.title: Beautiful stay

reviews.text: muneesh
reviews.title: Food was the main USP

reviews.text: Had a nice time staying at mpg club, service was excellent sp. thanx to Sufiyan, food was really good hope to visit again.
reviews.title: Good Place

reviews.text: The view was nice and liked the total ambience.
reviews.title: Classic Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at restraunt was really nice made the total experience wonderfull.
reviews.title: Awesome experience ....Excellent room Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I enjoyed my stay at MPG Club. Rooms are reasonable and good for stay. The View from the rooms are very nice. The Service is very good and friendly particularly Mr Aquib Shaikh he has give a good service just like a good friend. Talking about for the place, it is cool and cam place away from all the noise that's the important thing for this resort. The Next good part is food which is never forgettable. bus Khate jao khate jao.. aur khabhi na bhulo.. Very Nice tast. So overall I would recommend others also to go and experience the stay.
reviews.title: Best in Mahabaleshwar

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I enjoyed my stay at MPG Club. The rooms were nice and pleasant and the food was good. Hotel Staff is very helpful. I would like to mention Sufiyaan for helping us out with a problem with our car. The hotel staff's gesture in helping us fix our car took customer experience to a higher level
reviews.title: Lovely Weekend Trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I enjoyed my stay in MPG club. Room was comfortable with a good view and a huge garden. Room Service, Cleanliness, upkeep of the property and above all the food was great.here with . Service was very good and staff very helpful particularly Sufiyan and Kishor. Hotel is value for money. I will visit once again when...
reviews.title: Heaven on Earth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had been to this hotel and it was a pleasant stay. It had awesome food and staff was very nice and friendly, especially Sufiyan. He assisted us throughout our stay and ensured that we had a nice and comfortable stay in mahabaleshwar. However, rooms were highly priced for the condition they were in, they were getting renovated. It is very close to the market and had a good ambience.
reviews.title: Had a Pleasant Stay

reviews.text: Property is close to Market area. Pictures on the website are actual photographs and the resort looks very much like those in the pictures. The rooms should have tea / coffee machines which they did not. Room service would provide the tea / coffee on request but a number of times they were not hot. Buffet lunch spead was expensive - around 500 per meal after we negotiated some discount. For that amount of money the food spread was average. Breakfast was included and faily good.
reviews.title: Nice Property - Mahabaleshwar

reviews.text: Thanks Tripadvisor, one more happy review from me, based on reviews on your webpage and I largely agree with fellow-members who have had a ball during their stay at MPG Club.
reviews.title: Best Buffet Spread in Mahabaleshwar

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights in November week 1. I was lucky that 2 rooms were available when I called to inquire. On-line booking showed the property was sold-out on those days. Upon check-in, I was even more pleased to get an upgrade for 1 of the 2 rooms I booked.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay!
Review
reviews.text: Simply outstanding overall! Excellent location, close to market street, expansive lawns, well maintained main-clubhouse housing the reception, restaurant and other common areas. I was told this used to be Parsi Gymkhana of Mahabaleshwar in old times and is now managed as a hotel by ROYAL ORCHID group.

The standard room MAISON where my parents stayed, appeared to be recently renovated whereas ours was a larger room MAISONETTE looked like needing a face-lift. Marbled basin counter had mold and wooden door frames and door looked worn out. Beds were springy, so those who are bot used to sleeping on such surfaces, would wake up with stiff back and neck.
reviews.title: Nice place but needs improvment ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As for food, best among almost all hotels in Mahabaleshwar. The buffet spread during all 3 meals offered a wide choice with best quality ingredients. For breakfast, a live counter for omelette and eggs-to-order which is rare in Mahabaleshwar hotels as most hotels by and large cater to strict vegetarians. Besides eggs counter, breakfast cereals, Indian vegetarian section offered North Indian and south Indian varieties, croissants, cup-cakes and bread toasts etc.
reviews.title: Awesome experience
